We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. Mike Pence has been publicly pondering whether to run for the governor's office or for president for several months. [...] A visit to Tunisia by defence secretary Donald Rumsfeld in February 2006 proves even more revealing: "We have a very long relationship with Tunisia," Donald Rumsfeld remarked after the meetings. Tunisia is a moderate Muslim nation that has been and is today providing very constructive leadership in the world. The struggle that's taking place within that faith is a serious one, an important one. There's a very small number of violent extremists on the one side against a broad, overwhelming majority of people who are moderate.
